alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Roseau; South Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 3:20PM CST until December 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Roseau, Lake Of The Woods, North Beltrami, North Clearwater and South Beltrami Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Heavy snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snow and freezing drizzle expected Wednesday through Friday, potentially prolonging winter impacts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Roseau; South Beltrami
